column4: Does anyone know how to set my wifi driver to a license that DOESNT TAINT MY KERNEL AND MAKES IT CRASH EVERY DAY
what is the output of: lsb_release -sc
what is the product line for the wif device in the output of:  sudo lshw -C network
obviously, my bad. AR8151 v2.0 Gigabit Ethernet
damn copy pasting, sorry. RT3060 Wireless 802.11n 1T/1R
